subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire, Carmelo Anthony and Tyson Chandler thrived on the floor together and helped the Knicks shore up a flagging defense in a 113-97 win over Orlando.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire, Carmelo Anthony and Tyson Chandler thrived on the floor together and helped the Knicks shore up a flagging defense in a 113-97 win over Orlando.
